column1: Friends may call at the Cozean Memorial Chapel & Crematory on Friday June 12
column2: 2015 from 5 p.m. to 8 p.m. A Rebekahs Memorial Service will be held a 7 p.m. Visitation will resume on Saturday after 7 a.m. and continue until the funeral service at 11 a.m. in the Cozean Chapel with the Reverend Dr. Darrell Curtis officiating. Interment will be at the Farmington Odd Fellows Cemetery.
